title: Wrist Radio
summary: Standalone Android Wear internet radio streaming app. Plus extra's
description: This is a first of its kind standalone Android Wear app that lets you stream internet radio stations directly from your Android Wear watch. For this app to work your Android Wear watch need a WIFI or MOBILE network connection. You can use the speaker on your watch but you can also connect your Bluetooth headset (or speaker) to listen to the music stations.This app is ideal for any situation where you rather not take your phone with you. (e.g. running)The app has a nice and clean interface. You can pick and save your favorite radio stations. (long press on any station in the main list)** NEW**By tapping on the center of the screen you can cycle trough different Display states.1 Display Radio station name2 Display time3 Display current speed (ideal for running and cycling, etc)4 Display nothing (saves battery)** NEW**FAQ:Why does this app need Location permissionThis app uses the location to calculate and show you your speed. Nothing more and nothing less. After download you can choose not to give to app the location permission. Also the location provider is closed if the user changes the the app screen to anything else then the speed screen (this saves your battery). This a a paid app for friends and like minded we grantee not to use anything other then intended.*** - ** - ***We did not bother including thousands of useless radio stations. We want to include only the stations the end users actually use. So if you like this app but your favorite station is missing please consider rating this app in the Google Play Store (it will make our day) and just send a  e-mail with your favorite radio station or feature ideas. We will look in to including your favorite station and / or feature ideas. This is a must have app for any Android Wear watch owners with network capabilities !!This app uses network streaming, therefore:A) It will have an impact on the your batteryB) It will have an impact on your data planFor any feedback, improvements or any inconveniences please consider contacting me personally before giving bad ratings.Android Applications by, DrewApps.
descriptionHTML:
This is a first of its kind standalone Android Wear app that lets you stream internet radio stations directly from your Android Wear watch. For this app to work your Android Wear watch need a WIFI or MOBILE network connection. You can use the speaker on your watch but you can also connect your Bluetooth headset (or speaker) to listen to the music stations.

This app is ideal for any situation where you rather not take your phone with you. (e.g. running)

The app has a nice and clean interface.
You can pick and save your favorite radio stations. (long press on any station in the main list)

** NEW**
By tapping on the center of the screen you can cycle trough different Display states.
1 Display Radio station name
2 Display time
3 Display current speed (ideal for running and cycling, etc)
4 Display nothing (saves battery)
** NEW**

FAQ:
Why does this app need Location permission
This app uses the location to calculate and show you your speed. Nothing more and nothing less. After download you can choose not to give to app the location permission. Also the location provider is closed if the user changes the the app screen to anything else then the speed screen (this saves your battery). This a a paid app for friends and like minded we grantee not to use anything other then intended.

*** - ** - ***
We did not bother including thousands of useless radio stations. We want to include only the stations the end users actually use. So if you like this app but your favorite station is missing please consider rating this app in the Google Play Store (it will make our day) and just send a e-mail with your favorite radio station or feature ideas. We will look in to including your favorite station and / or feature ideas.

This is a must have app for any Android Wear watch owners with network capabilities !!

This app uses network streaming, therefore:
A) It will have an impact on the your battery
B) It will have an impact on your data plan

For any feedback, improvements or any inconveniences please consider contacting me personally before giving bad ratings.

Android Applications by, DrewApps.
comments: I like this radio app, It just needs polished as signal keeps dropping out every 5 seconds. If this was fixed I'd be happy to give 5 stars.
Poor UI, unstable app. Waste of money. Developer refusing to refund.
Great little app for streaming radio through the speaker on your watch. More stations being added, and requests accepted by developer.
Great app. Please add WGR RADIO 550 AM from USA. Thanks.
I already purchase this app and it works with my huawei watch 2.. can you add radio from Indonesia for the next update.. thank you..
Excellent radio app for android wear and developer happy to help if you have a request.
recentChanges: Added multiple radio station on users request
